title: PATCH 5.5 or Bard release Date (OCE)
body: HI guys I haven't played Bard but I'm really excited about him. Do you guys Know when is his release date?

replies.body: well time to load up some riot points and be the happiest camper in the world.
i think he is getting released on 3/11/15 which is tomorrow{{champion:1}} {{summoner:12}} {{item:3512}}
